name: Perpetuus (balmut)
description:
An old game I made, uploaded here for archival purposes.

 (If it's popular I'll see about rebuilding and updating it)

Inspired by endless runners see how far you can survive in this endless RPG.

Unlock new classes as you advance.
Start with more Potions the more you die!

  • Buy Potions from friendly Shopkeepers.
  • Rest at Inns to restore your health and mana.
  • Use Blacksmiths to upgrade your weapon or armour.
  • Pray to Altars to raise or lower the enemies level (and the exp they give).
  • Loot Chests for gold and precious potions.
  • Add elemental defence or damage to your gear with Enchanters.
  • Risk gold in Wishing Wells for potential rewards.
